articles.description: He will stay in charge until Rahul Dravid recovers from a bout of Covid-19 and can join the team in UAE
articles.content: NewsHe will stay in charge until Rahul Dravid recovers from a bout of Covid-19 and can join the team in UAE

articles.title: Highlights ATK Mohun Bagan vs Mumbai City FC, Durand Cup 2022: ATKMB Share the Spoils; Match Ends in a 1-1 Dr - India.com
articles.description: ATK Mohun Bagan vs Mumbai City FC, Durand Cup 2022: The highlanders are still undefeated against the Mariners and now the Green and Maroon Brigade are in serious trouble in the competition with two matches still left to play.

articles.title: Shubman Gill set to play for Glamorgan for remainder of 2022 County Championship season - ESPNcricinfo
